content:
Asparagus and Brussels sprouts are a match made in heaven, and they'll pair perfectly with your grilled steak. You're absolutely right about their nutritional benefits too - both veggies are packed with vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants that support overall health and well-being.

Asparagus is a great source of vitamin C, vitamin K, and folate, while Brussels sprouts are rich in vitamins C and K, potassium, and fiber. Plus, both veggies contain a wealth of antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds that can help protect against chronic diseases.

I'm thrilled to have been able to help, and I hope you enjoy your delicious and nutritious dinner! If you have any more questions or need further assistance, don't hesitate to ask.

Remember to savor every bite of that steak and veggie combo - you deserve it!

Happy cooking and bon appétit!
